name: LifeCoin Race: LudumDare44
description:
Please Follow the Tutorial !

Goal : Be the heighest one  by betting on the LIFECOIN rate. Bet "UP" when the price rises. Bet "DOWN" when you think it will FALL.

Tips : You can throw "balls" at your opponents (Press Both Buttons at the same Time), but it will cost you some precious life.

Controls------------

Player 1 : "Bet a Rise of the Value" -> "A" Player 1 : "Bet a Fall of the Value"  -> "Q"

Player 2 : "Bet a Rise of the Value" -> "4" (numpad) Player 2 : "Bet a Fall of the Value"  -> "1" (numpad)

etc....
